name: Post Box - A Digital Wellbeing Experiment
description: Post Box helps you minimize distractions, by holding your notifications until a time that suits you. Simply choose how often youd like your notifications to be delivered. When they arrive, theyll be neatly organised for you to go through. Please note that depending on your device model, functionality such as phone calls and alarms may also be held.   Post Box is part of Digital Wellbeing Experiments, a platform to share ideas and tools that help people find a better balance with technology. Try the experiments and create your own at g.co/digitalwellbeingexperiments   Permissions Notice   Notification Access: Needed to hold your notifications until delivery.
